title: Spanish fish and potato stew
ingredients: ['500g Salad potatoes, thickly sliced', '500g white fish fillet, skinned and cut into chunks', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 red onion, sliced', '1 tablespoon smoked paprika', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 garlic cloves, crushed (optional)', '1 red pepper, roughly chopped (optional)', '100g pitted green olives, halved (optional)']
